data.text:
Civil Cases in District Court (through )

Free Caseload Data for Individual Judges

This interactive tool provides caseload information on every federal district judge who handled at least 50 civil cases during the past 12 months. There is an overview demonstrating how to navigate the list and reports, as well as information about how the data were developed.

For Subscribers Only:

Custom Judge Reports

Select one of the performance statistics below to be generated when you click "view." Click here for a sample report and here to subscribe.

Median Pending Time

Average Pending Time

Median Closing Time

Average Closing Time

All users can filter by judge name, nature of suit and/or district to generate listings of closed and pending case counts.
